DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety and intraocular pressure (IOP)-lowering efficacy of anecortave acetate for treatment of elevated IOP in patients with open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Anecortave Acetate in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of openangle glaucoma; Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Pseudoexfoliation; Pigment dispersion component; Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
